title: Freeze issue op
body: Can anyone help me with this annoying freezes? While i play lol it just freeze my game and disconnect while it create an awful sound. I tried everyone what YouTube says even downloading RegCurePro and i m not quite sure if it help but i cant stand my teammates losing just because of my excuses.This is exact what happen but longer than that https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eOLZvXvSZUg

replies.body:
Hey Animezboy009o,

That sound makes it sound like aliens are abducting your computer. You may want to give Riots connection KB a whack and see if that helps. 


Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so feel free to reach out if that doesn't seem to work .

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
